name: U.F.OhNo!
description:
A little alien shooting game made in PICO-8.

Features 3 enemy types, 1 unlockable character and a hard mode.

Best played using a standard keyboard. Use the Z and X buttons to move your character left and right. Use the left, up and right arrow keys to fire your gun. Hold up and left or right to fire diagonally. Don't overuse your gun otherwise it will overheat!
